statements: SELECT * FROM Categories;
SELECT category_id, type, brand FROM Categories;
SELECT * FROM Categories WHERE brand = 'Apple';
SELECT category_id, type FROM Categories WHERE attribute IS NOT NULL;
SELECT category_id, type FROM Categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Categories WHERE type = 'Electronics';
SELECT category_id, type FROM Categories WHERE brand IS NOT NULL ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Categories WHERE type LIKE '%Clothing%' AND brand = 'Nike';
SELECT type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM Categories GROUP BY type ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM Categories WHERE attribute IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Categories;
SELECT category_name, category_type FROM Categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM Products p JOIN Categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category_type FROM Products p JOIN Categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Categories WHERE category_type='Electronics'
SELECT category_name, category_type FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC
SELECT category_id, category_name, category_type FROM Categories WHERE category_id > 3 AND category_type='Clothing'
SELECT category_id, category_name, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM Categories LEFT JOIN Products ON Categories.category_id = Products.category_id GROUP BY category_id
SELECT category_name, product_name FROM Categories JOIN Products ON Categories.category_id = Products.category_id WHERE category_name LIKE '%Tech%'
SELECT * FROM Categories;
SELECT category_name, product_type FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Categories INNER JOIN Products ON Categories.category_id = Products.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT category_name, product_name FROM Categories LEFT JOIN Products ON Categories.category_id = Products.category_id WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY category_name, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT category_name, brand_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Categories LEFT JOIN Products ON Categories.category_id = Products.category_id GROUP BY category_name, brand_name;
SELECT category_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM Categories LEFT JOIN Products ON Categories.category_id = Products.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING AVG(price) > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_name, price FROM Products JOIN Categories ON Products.category_id = Categories.category_id WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY category_name, price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_date, sale_price * quantity_sold AS total_revenue FROM Sales JOIN Products ON Sales.product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name, category_type FROM Categories WHERE category_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT brand_id, brand_name FROM Brands;
SELECT attribute_id, attribute_name FROM Attributes WHERE attribute_id <= 5;
SELECT * FROM Categories;
SELECT category_name, category_type FROM Categories ORDER BY category_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name, b.brand_name FROM Products p JOIN Categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN Brands b ON p.product_id = b.brand_id;
SELECT a.attribute_name, count(*) as total_products FROM Attributes a JOIN Products p ON a.attribute_id = p.product_id GROUP BY a.attribute_name HAVING count(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM Categories LIMIT 5;
SELECT category_name, category_brand FROM Categories WHERE category_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT brand_name, brand_country FROM Brands ORDER BY brand_country DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT username, email, age FROM Users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM Categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT category_name, category_type FROM Categories WHERE category_type = 'Electronics' ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT brand_name, brand_country FROM Brands WHERE brand_country = 'USA' ORDER BY brand_name;
SELECT username, email, age FROM Users ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC;
